description:
***Bee the 1rst Early Bird Badge***
Bonus feature: Owners of this badge receive 24 hour early access to rare AYA NFT releases. This means you can claim and buy it before it gets on the auction!

Rules:
Once the announcement for the NFT has been made it's 1rst come 1rst serve;
AYA Nature decides which NFT's can be claimed by this badge;
Follow us on Twitter @AYANatureNews.

Important: Add your twitter address in the message after you press 'Participateâ€™.

Love,
AYA Nature
